title: Endpoint & Mobile Security
caption: Providing advanced solutions to reach beyond basic protection
overview: Securing mobile endpoints (includes smartphones, tablets, and notebooks) has become a key requirement for most organizations. Our Mobile Endpoint Protection solutions provide comprehensive risk management across devices. The aim is to protect your data against applications, computers, and network-based threats while offering visibility and data leak control.
solTitle: Protects Endpoints on all your platforms

services.title: Endpoint Security
services.content: It consists of a remote bridge approach to protect the devices while connecting to computer networks. As per experts connecting laptops, smartphones, tablets or other wireless devices to a corporate network can produce malicious attack routes. Our solutions have been developed to form a protective shield against such attacks.

services.title: Endpoint Encryption
services.content: Our encryption software is designed to secure sensitive information during storage and transmission to a specific endpoint. There are various types of data that can be encrypted including home addresses, health-care data, bank account information, etc.

services.title: Endpoint Threat Detection and Response (ETDR)
services.content: This solution involves the use of the latest technology which allows us to continuously track and respond to advanced threats. ETDR is a security solution that comprises real-time data collection and surveillance using rule-based automated response and analysis.

services.title: Mobile Device Management (MDM)
services.content: As an important component of mobility management, it goes hand in hand with other important security aspects like Identity and Access Management (IAM). It has two main elements  - the MDM agent and the MDM server.

services.title: Mobile Security
services.content: As the name suggests it involves the security of portable wireless devices like smartphones, tablets, etc. With more people opting for such devices itâ€™s a top priority to secure them from computer-related threats and vulnerabilities. We do so by ensuring the protection of devices as well as the networks they are linked to.

services.title: Mobile Data Encryption
services.content: We use a combination of software to mitigate the risk of data breaches of organizations' devices by adding multiple layers of security.
